org.TagCloud

Class TagCloudJLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • org.TagCloud.TagCloudJLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class TagCloudJLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    A JLabel that shows a word (in a Tag Cloud) with a color that changes depending on a percentage and a size that increases with a percentage. It also highlights the term in a different color if the mouse moves over the label.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
